column4: 2017 年按區議會分區及性別劃分的勞動人口數目及勞動人口參與率
Labour force and labour force participation rates by District Council district and sex, 2017

column3: 數目進位至最接近的百位數。
column13: Figures are rounded to the nearest hundred.

column3: 由於四捨五入關係，個別數字加起來可能與總數不符。
column13: Figures may not add up to total due to rounding.

column3: 圓括號內的數字是指在某一特定的區議會分區及性別組別中的15歲及以上人士的勞動人口參與率。
column13: Figures in round brackets refer to labour force participation rates in respect of persons aged 15 and over in the specified District Council district and sex group.

column3: 方括號內的數字是指撇除外籍家庭傭工後的勞動人口參與率。
column13: Figures in square brackets refer to the labour force participation rates with foreign domestic helpers excluded.
